scripts.buildDev: REACT_APP_ENV=development react-scripts build && cp -r ./img ./build/static && cp ./img/icons/favicon.ico ./build/static && mv ./build ./builds/buildDev
scripts.buildLocal: REACT_APP_ENV=development REACT_APP_LOCAL=true react-scripts build && cp -r ./img ./build/static && cp ./img/icons/favicon.ico ./build/static && mv ./build ./builds/buildLocal
scripts.buildAll: npm run build && npm run buildDev && npm run buildLocal
